nodes.text: Energy capsules, also known as food capsules, were a type of food. Members of the Jedi Order often carried energy capsules on their utility belts. Each contained tiny pellets with enough energy to sustain a Jedi on distant planets and long space journeys. The patrons of a cantina on Enujut were once compelled by the telepathic Zemerin into arguing over what type of food capsule tasted best.
